page.title: 16Religion
page.content: Out of all the things in Leintwardine the{church}has always been the main attraction.Nobody knows the exact depth of the foundations.The massive church{steeple}towers 70 feet up with {103}steps inside.The {bells}are not the originals, but 5 of them are older than the others.In all there are 8 bells.The roof of the{nave}is 15th century. At a lower level are the corbels of an earlier roof.The roofs of the{aisles and north-aisle}chapel are also 15th century,but that of the mortimer chapel-the trussed rafter type-is 14th century.There are two grave-yards because there were too many graves to fit into the church yard so they opened a cemetry which is now opposite the primary school.
